entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Sarnia
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 7:00 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, 0.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sarnia Chris Hadfield Airport 9:17 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: 0.2°C
Pressure: 99.3 kPa
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: -0.2°C
Wind: NE 39 km/h gust 50 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low zero. Forecast issued 9:49 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then clearing. Wind north 30 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 9:49 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023
